name: SuperRareBears RARE
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
RARE is used within the SuperRareBears Ecosystem, an NFT project built on MultiversX. They have now expanded into the DeFi space. RARE trades on Jungle DEX part of multiversX xExchange.

RARE is deflationary, with an aggressive burn mechanism

$RARE is used for 

Governance 
DeFi
Staking
Minting
NFT marketplace trading
Gaming
